title: Iâ€™m Not Okay
lyrics:
[Intro]
My heart's your heart
My love's your love
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
[Verse 1]
I've seen what you're facing, please don't be alarmed
If you need me just call me, you're never alone
Hey, barely sleeping and barely eating
Until the rain turns into change
[Chorus]
My heart your heart
My love your love
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
And my mind is your mind
And my soul is your soul
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
[Verse 2]
Hey, I'm headed wherever you're going
And I mean that from my heart
In the end you'll see that I've been there from the start
I'm not walking away, not talking just to say
Your pain's my pain and your game's my game

[Chorus]
My heart your heart
My love your love
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
And my mind is your mind
And my soul is your soul
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
[Verse 3]
I want to be right here
To make sure your tears don't form a river
I'm going to be right here
Until your vision becomes clearer
I ain't sleeping, I'm not eating
Until the rain turns into change
[Chorus]
My heart your heart
My love your love
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
And my mind is your mind
And my soul is your soul
And I'm not okay unless you're okay
